name: Community Ventures in Living, Ltd.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Ventures in Living, Ltd. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Lafayette, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $34.0M in Medicaid payments across 18K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $34.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
